item.title: Who accounts the top power?
item.description: As I scale up my knowledge from local to global, from first world to third world, I have strongly started sensing this pattern. And my question has only gotten more intriguing (and quite saddening) - who controls the top power? The power “The power” is anything to which you have to obey, usually with no questions asked. With this it could be your parents (if you obey) = the power, your boss at job?
